https://tmrev.io/movie/20781-Angel of Death 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xbNgVKUVOhe4x3ZChhX8hHTzvgY.jpg In the tradition of Grindhouse, Kill Bill and Sin City, award-winning comic book writer Ed Brubaker (Incognito, The Death of Captain America, Daredevil) teams up with stuntwoman-turned-cult star Zoe Bell (Death Proof, TV's "Lost") to deliver a stark, stylish pulp thriller about a very bad girl gone "good." Angel of Death
